title: Memo to Gnu Math Teachers
content: I archived this [memo to gnu math teachers](http://mathforum.org/kb/thread.jspa?threadID=1409610) to the Math Forum with some sense of  [déjà vu](http://people.howstuffworks.com/question657.htm).  Didn't I archive something similar, some time ago?In any case, our network is clearly emergent and chaordic, versus some top-down pyramid hierarchy.  That doesn't mean it can't work, as [Dee Hock](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dee_Hock) tirelessly reminds us.
author: Kirby Urner
